schoolDetails:
Industrial Engineering is a broad engineering discipline focusing on improving systems and processes by statistical analysis, simulation, design, and quality control. Some of my favorite and more relevant courses were
  • Introduction to C++
  • Informatics and System Simulation &
  • Advanced Data Analytics
amexDetails:
I joined Amex in 2019 immediately following graduation. Im currently on a full stack team that helps build digital solutions and products for American Express Merchants on a global scale. Our tech stack includes React, Java Spring Boot, and PostgreSQL.
In my spare time, I have been working on an internal url shortening tool using React and Express. This tool is projected to save Amex $200,000 per year on licensing cost alone
